title: San Francisco Police State, Oz The Whack And Sourful 07.22.22
itunes:title: San Francisco Police State, Oz The Whack And Sourful 07.22.22
description:
In episode 1293, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian, actor, and co-host of The Boss Bitch Show, Kirsten O'Brien, to discuss… SF ousted a progressive DA and is now ushering in a surveillance state…, Checking in With Dr. Oz’s Garbage Campaign and more!

  1. SF Ousted a Progressive DA and Is Now Ushering In a Surveillance State…
  2. Checking in With Dr. Oz’s Garbage Campaign
  3. Snooki got dragged into the Pennsylvania Senate race to troll Dr. Oz
  4. Dr. Oz Says 'MAGA Movement Is Dying' While His Campaign Trails Democrat in Fundraising for Pa. Senate Race
  5. John Fetterman reveals undisclosed heart condition that led to stroke
  6. Where in the world is Dr. Oz?

LISTEN: One Spliff A Day by Billy Boyo

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
